views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8 - 12

SMSNoLinkOpen gives you simply the Handy/Smart Feature to force the Messages Application to not open External Links on Touch (like Links with URL Previews and Phone Numbers) and without disabling the Prompt options!

The Tweak is out of Stage from my Repository.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

Credits/Testers: Thanks @Coalition by Flex Community for the tip in making this Tweak and @Twitter Users/Developers for being so nice for testing it.

would be greatly appreciated!

Configure options from Settings.

Version 1.1.1 - Added The option to Disable the Top Conversations Search Bar Feature. Version 1.1.0
- Added Support for arm64e/A12.


Version 1.0.9
- Added Support for iOS 12 as Requested (not yet for arm64e/A12 Devices since Iâ€™m out of my Home now, Added asap).
- Added the option to Hide the Messages Conversations List Cell Right Chevrons Views.
Version 1.0.8
- Added the option to Delete the Conversations in Messages with a Long One Swipe Gesture on iOS 11 (included My Tweak dragToDeleteMessages on My Repo).
- Added the option to Hide the Messages Labels View on Everywhere (thanks jaysams).
- Added some Colors in Preferences.
- Added Images and Labels in Preferences
Version 1.0.7
- Added Full iOS 11 Compatibility.
- Added the option to Prevent the Feature to Delete Conversations.
- Added the option to Hide the Applications Bar iOS 11 Feature on the Bottom Entry View (Integration of NoMessageAppStrip Tweak Available on My Repository).
- Added the option to Disable Messages App from Rotating Feature.
- Added the option to Disable the Large Navigation Titles on iOS 11.
- Changes in the Prefs.
Version 1.0.6
- Added the option to Custom Change the Text of the Messages Field (tip by sinfool).
- Added the Label to Email Me in the Preferences Panel.
- Added the Label to Check the Other Tweaks Made by Me on the BigBoss Repo in the Preferences Panel.
- Change in Prefs.
- Changed the Description of the File Control.
Version 1.0.5
- Added the option to Disable the Feature to Swipe to Delete Messages.
Version 1.0.4
- Added the option to Make Messages App opening Directly new Composition Screen.
- Added the option to Hide Entry Field Buttons.
- Now you can Donate Me (thanks so much) with the New Label in Preferences Panel.


Version 1.0.3
- Added the option to make Messages App hiding Preview Text in Conversations List (Addition Feature).
- Now you can add My Repo on Cydia with the New Label in Preferences Panel.
- Changes in Labels Description in Prefs.


Version 1.0.2
- Added the option to make Messages App disabling Smart Links (thanks sinfool for the idea).
- Changes in Preferences Panel.


Version 1.0.1
- As said, added the Preferences Panel.
